history.content:
I'm not sure if the same rules apply for summer, but I turned in my application a few days before classes ended this Spring, so I'm guessing it's all good.

I've heard that declaration applications are mostly processed twice a year, once near the end of each semester (hopefully before Phase I). If you have a need to declare earlier, or out of sync with that schedule, talk to one of the CS advisors at cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu
I'm not sure if the same rules apply for summer, but I turned in my application a few days before classes ended this Spring, so I'm guessing it's all good

any day before the last day of lecture. If you're ready to submit now, please feel free to do so. Please make sure you see a confirmation screen/receive a confirmation email. If you don't see one, please resubmit.

Hi! For the CS application, can we turn it anytime before the deadline which I hear is usually the last day of lecture during the summer? I am just curious so I know if I can turn it in now or the last day of lecture! thank you so much!
history.subject: L&S CS application
